snippet: The fast-food company said sales rose in the United States but still fell globally, and placed some of the blame on fears in Asia of a new strain of avian flu.
abstract: McDonald's reports April sales rose in United States but still fell globally, and places some of blame on fears in Asia of new strain of avian flu; US sales rose 0.7 percent.
lead_paragraph: The fast-food company said sales rose in the United States but still fell globally, and placed some of the blame on fears in Asia of a new strain of avian flu.

headline.seo: McDonald’s Reports Lower Sales in April
headline.main: McDonald’s Reports Fall In April Sales
headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Reports Fall In April Sales
